M. Ravanelli
L. Cristoforetti
R. Gretter
M. Pellin

dcterms:description: A standard phoneme recognition task dataset used in a close-talking scenario for speech recognition experiments.
dcterms:title: TIMIT

dcterms:creator: M. Ravanelli
L. Cristoforetti
R. Gretter
M. Pellin
A. Sosi
M. Omologo
dcterms:description: A dataset used for distant-speech recognition tasks in domestic environments, contaminated with noise and reverberation.
dcterms:title: Wall Street Journal (WSJ)

dcterms:creator: M. Ravanelli
L. Cristoforetti
R. Gretter
M. Pellin
A. Sosi
M. Omologo
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 409 WSJ sentences uttered by six native American speakers, used for testing in a distant-talking scenario.
dcterms:title: DIRHA-English corpus

dcterms:creator: M. Ravanelli
P. Svaizer
M. Omologo
dcterms:description: A dataset that includes both real and simulated datasets for distant speech recognition, used in conjunction with the WSJ dataset.
dcterms:title: DIRHA-English corpus (real and simulated datasets)
